Parts of Speech.question: Which word is a noun in the sentence: 'The cat sleeps on the sofa'?
Parts of Speech.explanation: ‘Cat’ is the name of an animal, so it is a noun.

Parts of Speech.question: Which word is a verb?
Parts of Speech.explanation: ‘Run’ shows an action, so it is a verb.

Parts of Speech.question: Identify the adjective: 'She wore a beautiful dress.'
Which word is a pronoun?
Parts of Speech.explanation: ‘He’ is used in place of a noun.

Identify the noun: 'Honesty is the best policy.'
Which part of speech is the word 'they'?
Identify the verb: 'Birds fly in the sky.'
Which word is an adverb in 'He speaks softly'?
Identify the conjunction: 'I tried but failed.'
Identify the part of speech of the underlined word: He has **already** finished the work.
Parts of Speech.explanation: ‘Already’ modifies the verb ‘finished’, so it is an adverb.

Parts of Speech.question: Which word functions as a noun in the sentence: 'Swimming is good for health'?
Parts of Speech.explanation: ‘Swimming’ is a gerund acting as a noun.
